title: How to Make Space in Little Alchemy: Step by Step Guide

steps.title: Combine Star and Sky to make Space.
steps.content: Combine Star and Sky to make Space. If you don't have Space, you can also use Sun or Moon. [1] X Research source If you're starting from the beginning , here's the fastest way to make Space: Water + Fire = Steam Air + Steam = Cloud Air + Cloud = Sky Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Sky + Stone = Moon Sky + Moon = Night Night + Sky = Star Star + Sky = Space

steps.title: Combine Solar System and Sky to make Space.
steps.content: Combine Solar System and Sky to make Space. If you don't have Sky, you can also use Night. Alternatively, you can combine Star with Sky, Sun, or Moon to create Space. If you're starting from the beginning, here's the fastest way to make Space: Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Planet + Planet = Solar system Planet + Fire = Sun Air + Planet = Atmosphere Sun + Atmosphere = Sky Solar system + Sky = Space

steps.title: Space recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2.
steps.content: Space recipes will vary slightly between Little Alchemy 1 and 2. Be sure to use the recipes for the version you're using. Little Alchemy 1 : Space + Life = Alien Space + Human = Astronaut Space + Stone = Meteoroid Space + Earth + Planet Space + Airplane = Rocket Space + House = Space station Space + Time = Tardis Space + Glass = Telescope Little Alchemy 2 : Space + Life = Alien Space + Human = Astronaut Space + Thermometer = Cold Space + Monster (DLC) or Deity (DLC) = Cthulhu (DLC) Space + Star/Solar system/Space = Galaxy Space + Sword = Light sword Space + Stone/Rock/Boulder = Meteoroid Space + Earth = Planet Space + House/Wall/Village = Space station Space + Airplane/Metal/Steel/Pirate ship/Boat/Steamboat/Car = Spaceship Space + Telescope/Sky/Night/Sun = Star Space + Day = Sun Space + Explosion = Supernova Space + Glass = Telescope Space + Container = Universe
